output.sentences: We attended the presentation at city hall on Martin Luther King Day.
There were several speakers, one of whom read a children's book to the kids in attendance.
They had some amazing musical talent there.
The audience loved the main speaker, who had a great sense of humor.
Afterwards the audience walked together out into the street and around the block to a memorial picnic.
